Trustee_13_pre_2.name: Emma Dubois
Trustee_13_pre_2.content: I successfully navigated the investment process with Isabella Costa, demonstrating trustworthiness by adhering to the proposed allocation plan and ensuring transparent profit distribution. My previous reputation was unrecorded, and this positive experience enhances my credibility as a trustee. I will continue to promote fairness and integrity in all future transactions.

Investor_13_pre_6.name: Emma Dubois
Investor_13_pre_6.content: Throughout the investment process, I demonstrated open-mindedness and a collaborative spirit, engaging with my trustee in good faith. By clearly understanding the allocation plan, I was able to foster a trusting relationship, resulting in an allocation that exceeded my expectations. My effective collaboration has now positioned me as a reliable investor, enhancing my reputation and attracting future opportunities.
